lead_paragraph: The war in Syria is increasingly being woven into Lebanon, as two neighborhoods in Tripoli, divided along sectarian lines, engage in an escalating battle.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject

snippet: The war in Syria is increasingly being woven into Lebanon, as two neighborhoods in Tripoli, divided along sectarian lines, engage in an escalating battle....

headline.print_headline: Syrian War Plays Out Along Street in Lebanon
headline.main: Syrian War Plays Out Along a Street in Lebanon
headline.seo: Syrian War Plays Out Along a Street in Lebanon

abstract: War in Syria is increasingly being woven into Lebanon, as the intensified battle between two neighborhoods in Tripoli, divided along sectarian lines, clearly illustrates; there is growing concern about how well Lebanon can handle the pressure from Syria's war and escalating sectarianism in the region.
